thread.title: Week 8 Prep Friday Football Live Chat
thread.title_full: Week 8 Prep Friday Football Live Chat

author: Tim Martinez
title: Week 8 Prep Friday Football Live Chat
text:
Week 8 Prep Friday Football Live Chat In-game updates begin at 4:30 p.m. 
By Tim Martinez , Columbian Assistant Sports Editor 
Published: October 23, 2015, 9:43 AM A Live Blog Week 8 Friday Football Live Chat 
Our Friday Prep Football Live Chat will keep you up-to-date on all of the high school football action in Southwest Washington. 
The Live Chat starts at 4:30 p.m. with Kelso-Heritage. Most of the rest of Friday’s schedule begins at 7 p.m. 
USING THE LIVE CHAT: Here are some tips to use the Live Chat applet. There is a scroll tool to the right of image that allows you to look at previous updates. The scores of the different games can been seen by clicking the triangle arrows to left and right of scores. If you click on the score, you’ll see an expanded scoreboard of that game. Use “Send question or comments” box to add posts to the Live Chat. 
Thurday’s game 
FINAL: Columbia River 25, Prairie 21 
Friday’s games 
Kelso vs. Heritage, 4:30 p.m. 
Washougal vs. Fort Vancouver, 5 p.m. 
King’s Way Christian vs. Friday Harbor, 6 p.m. 
Union vs. Battle Ground, 7 p.m. 
Woodland vs. Hockinson, 7 p.m. 
Hudson’s Bay vs. R.A. Long, 7 p.m. 
Mark Morris vs. Ridgefield, 7 p.m. 
Kalama vs. La Center, 7 p.m. 
Columbia-White Salmon vs. Seton Catholic, 7 p.m. 
Castle Rock vs. Stevenson, 7 p.m. 
Camas vs. Mountain View, 7:30 p.m. 
Evergreen vs. Skyview, 8 p.m.
